data.title: Facebook co-founder says Libra will give corporations too much power     - CNET
data.text: Chris Hughes has spoken out against Facebook's cryptocurrency project, calling it "frightening."

data.title: Bitcoin and Bank Stocks Are the Losers If Facebook’s Libra Wins
data.text: Facebook (NASDAQ:FB)'s new cryptocurrency, libra, if it catches on, is going to produce major winners and losers.

data.title: YCombinator CEO says Silicon Valley views Facebook's cryptocurrency 'positively'
data.text: Ali Rowghani, YCombinator CEO and former Twitter COO, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Silicon Valley's positive reception of Facebook's new cryptocurrency Libra, says he 'applauds' Facebook for its launch.

data.title: eBay and Facebook told to tackle trade in fake reviews
data.text: Facebook and eBay have been warned by the UK’s Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) to do more to tackle the sale of fake reviews on their platforms. Fake reviews are illegal under UK consumer protection law.

data.title: Libra: Four Reasons to be Extremely Cautious About Facebook’s New Currency
data.text: Get it right and Libra could be the world's first truly global currency. Get it wrong, on the other hand, and there's risk of systematic financial collapse.

data.title: If Facebook and Google don't fix their problems, advertising execs say they could go somewhere else
data.text: Ad executives at the annual Cannes Lions festival say Facebook and Google need to do more to clean up the content on their platforms.

data.title: The Week in Tech: Facebook’s Crypto Dream Faces Deep Mistrust
data.text: The social network has ambitious plans to create a universal currency for the internet. Its reputation could get in the way.

data.title: BOE Approaches Libra `With an Open Mind But Not an Open Door': Carney
data.text: Huw van Steenis, senior adviser to Bank of England Governor Mark Carney, discusses the BOE's report on the future of finance.

data.title: European central bankers claim oversight over Facebook’s cryptocurrency
data.text: Three European central bankers are claiming oversight over Facebook's planned virtual currency to ensure it will not jeopardize the financial system or be used to launder money.

data.title: Libra Will Expand Facebook's Kingdom Beyond Social Media
data.text: Libra will be a stable, independently managed cryptocurrency and targets a massive audience. Facebook will monetize with a digital wallet called Calibra. We expect rapid growth and wide adoption.

data.title: Facebook adds new limits to address the spread of hate speech in Sri Lanka and Myanmar
data.text: As Facebook grapples with the spread of hate speech on its platform, it is introducing changes that limit the spread of messages in two countries where it has come under fire in recent years: Sri Lanka and Myanmar. In a blog post on Thursday evening, Facebook said that it was “adding friction” to message forwarding […]

data.title: Central banks will want oversight of Facebook's Libra: Bank of England's Carney
data.text: Major central banks and regulators will want oversight of Facebook's proposed new currency and payment system, Libra, to ensure it is safe and does not allow money laundering or finance terrorism, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney said.

data.title: Bank of England keeps an 'open mind' on Facebook's cryptocurrency Libra
data.text: Bank of England Governor Mark Carney announced new measures on Thursday to help modernize and steer the central bank toward a new digital economy.
